message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $8,000.

I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,000 for the product, which is a fair price considering its value to me.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I understand you're looking for a fair price, but $8,000 is below my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $12,000. This is a compromise that should be more acceptable to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm sticking with my offer of $8,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to both of us. Let's find a way to make this work.

I understand you're trying to stick to your initial offer, but I'm not willing to go below $12,000. I'll make one more compromise, so I'll offer it to you for $11,000. This is my final concession, so please consider it carefully.
